entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 05:56 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.4°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
